BallCount.description: Maximum amount of balls that can be active from this launcher.

HitsBeforeBurst.description: How many times the balls from this launcher can be hit before bursting.

Friction.description: Something to do with the friction of the balls?

AirFriction.description: Something to do with the friction of the balls?

Speed.description: The speed the balls should be launched at?

DelayBetweenLaunches.description: How long it takes for this launcher to fire another ball.

Target.description: The object the balls should be fired towards?

Extra.name: The thing that launches the small magnetic balls in Aquatic Base.
